cause: Tomato mosaic virus (ToMV) valla kaluguthundi
Vyadhi sokina vitthanaalu, parikaraalu, chethulu mariyu mokkala sparsha dwara vyapisthundi
Ee virus uparithalalapai ekkuva kaalam jeevinchi untundi
cure: Viral infection-laku neruga rasaayana nivarana andubaatulo ledu
Vyadhi sokina mokkalanu ventane tholaginchi naashanam cheyandi
suggestions: Vyadhi nirodhaka tomato rakaalanu saagu cheyandi
Panta maarpidi cheyandi mariyu vyavasaayaaniki mundu pogaakunu thaakavaddhu

cause: Corynespora cassiicola ane shileendhram valla kaluguthundi
Adhika thema mariyu vecchani ushnograthala valla vruddhi chenduthundi
Gaali mariyu varshapu chinukula dwara vyapisthundi
cure: Chlorothalonil leda Mancozeb vanti shileendhra naashakaalanu pichikaari cheyandi
Vyadhi vyaapthini thagginchadaniki sokina aakulanu tholaginchandi
suggestions: Mokkala madhya gaali baaga thagilela choosukondi

cause: Xanthomonas jaathula valla kaluguthundi
Varshapu chinukulu, kalushithamaina parikaraalu mariyu vitthanaala dwara vyapisthundi
suggestions: Polam thadiga unnapudu pani cheyadam maanukondi

cause: Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus (TYLCV) valla kaluguthundi
Thella domala dwara vyapisthundi
suggestions: Thella domala niyanthranaku vepa noone leda Imidacloprid vaadandi
Pantala chakraalu okadaanitho okati kalavakunda choosukondi

cause: Phytophthora infestans valla kaluguthundi
Challani mariyu thadi paristhithulalo vruddhi chenduthundi
cure: Metalaxyl leda Mancozeb vanti shileendhra naashakaalanu vaadandi

cause: Passalora fulva ane shileendhram valla kaluguthundi
Adhika thema mariyu gaali sariga thagalini chota vasthundi
cure: Sulfur leda Copper shileendhra naashakaalanu vaadandi

cause: Alternaria solani ane shileendhram valla kaluguthundi
Varshapu chinukulu mariyu sokina vyarthaala dwara vyapisthundi
cure: Azoxystrobin leda Mancozeb vanti shileendhra naashakaalanu vaadandi

cause: Tetranychus urticae mites valla kaluguthundi
Vedi mariyu podi paristhithulalo vruddhi chenduthundi
suggestions: Lady beetles vanti sahaja shathruvulanu praveshapettandi

cause: Septoria lycopersici ane shileendhram valla kaluguthundi
Neeti thumparalu mariyu sokina vyarthaala dwara vyapisthundi
suggestions: Mokkala pai nundi neeru poyadam maanukondi

cause: Etuventi vyadhi ledu
suggestions: Keetakaalu mariyu vyadhula kosam tharachuga gamaninchandi
Saraina neeti paarudala mariyu drainage-ni choosukondi

cause: Phytophthora infestans valla kaluguthundi
Challani mariyu thadi vaathaavaranam vyadhiki anukoolam
cure: Metalaxyl vanti systemic shileendhra naashakaalanu vaadandi

cause: Alternaria solani valla kaluguthundi
Puccinia sorghi shileendhram valla kaluguthundi
Exserohilum turcicum valla kaluguthundi
Magnaporthe oryzae shileendhram valla kaluguthundi
Xanthomonas oryzae valla kaluguthundi
